events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it does not fit properly. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was reviewed and categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to sizing problems.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in processing refunds and returns.

Sure, my order number is 789456123. The jacket is still unused and still has the tags attached in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you a prepaid shipping label shortly.
That sounds perfect, thank you for your quick response and for providing the prepaid label. I appreciate your help.
We have received your returned jacket and successfully processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you again for the excellent service and support throughout the process.
The case regarding your refund is now closed. Please do not hesitate to contact us again if you need further assistance.
